mapper.sql: id, warehouse_no, batch_no, drug_id, stock_quantity, min_quantity, max_quantity, operator, create_time, update_time, waring, valid_waring
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from tb_stock
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_stock (id, warehouse_no, batch_no, drug_id, stock_quantity, min_quantity, max_quantity, operator, create_time, update_time, waring, valid_waring) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{warehouseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drugId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stockQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{minQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{maxQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), now(), #{waring,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{validWaring,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into tb_stock
id,
warehouse_no,
batch_no,
drug_id,
stock_quantity,
min_quantity,
max_quantity,
operator,
create_time,
update_time,
waring,
valid_waring,

mapper.update:
update tb_stock
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
warehouse_no = #{record.warehouseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
batch_no = #{record.batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
drug_id = #{record.drugId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
stock_quantity = #{record.stockQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
min_quantity = #{record.minQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
max_quantity = #{record.maxQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
operator = #{record.operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = now(),
waring = #{record.waring,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
valid_waring = #{record.validWaring,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update tb_stock set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, warehouse_no = #{record.warehouseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, batch_no = #{record.batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, drug_id = #{record.drugId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, stock_quantity = #{record.stockQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, min_quantity = #{record.minQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, max_quantity = #{record.maxQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, operator = #{record.operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = now(), waring = #{record.waring,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, valid_waring = #{record.validWaring,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update tb_stock
warehouse_no = #{warehouseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
batch_no = #{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
drug_id = #{drugId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
stock_quantity = #{stockQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
min_quantity = #{minQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
max_quantity = #{maxQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = now(),
waring = #{waring,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
valid_waring = #{validWaring,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_stock
warehouse_no = #{warehouseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
batch_no = #{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
drug_id = #{drugId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
stock_quantity = #{stockQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
min_quantity = #{minQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
max_quantity = #{maxQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = now(),
waring = #{waring,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
valid_waring = #{validWaring,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where drug_id = #{drugId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and batch_no = #{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update tb_stock
warehouse_no = #{warehouseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
batch_no = #{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
drug_id = #{drugId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
stock_quantity = #{stockQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
min_quantity = #{minQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
max_quantity = #{maxQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = now(),
waring = #{waring,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
valid_waring = #{validWaring,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where drug_id = #{drugId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_stock
update_time = now(),
waring = #{waring,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where drug_id = #{drugId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_stock set warehouse_no = #{warehouseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, batch_no = #{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, drug_id = #{drugId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, stock_quantity = #{stockQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, min_quantity = #{minQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, max_quantity = #{maxQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = now(), waring = #{waring,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, valid_waring = #{validWaring,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from tb_stock order by id desc limit 1

select count(*) from tb_stock s
and s.warehouse_no like '%' #{warehouseNo} '%'
and s.drug_id = #{drugId}
and s.operator like '%' #{operator} '%'
mapper.sql: s.id as id, s.warehouse_no as warehouse_no, s.batch_no as batch_no, s.drug_id as drug_id, stock_quantity, min_quantity, max_quantity, operator, s.create_time as create_time, s.update_time as update_time, waring, valid_waring, purchase_price, sale_price, date_format(produce_time,"%Y-%m-%d") as produce_time,date_format(valid_time,"%Y-%m-%d") as valid_time
mapper.select:
select
from tb_stock s,tb_purchase_item p
s.drug_id = p.drug_id and s.batch_no = p.batch_no
and s.warehouse_no like '%' #{warehouseNo} '%'
and s.drug_id = #{drugId}
and s.operator like '%' #{operator} '%'
order by s.id limit #{pageIndex} ,#{pageSize}

select count(distinct drug_id) from tb_stock s
and s.drug_id = #{drugId}

select count(distinct drug_id) from tb_stock s where ((select sum(s1.stock_quantity) from tb_stock s1 where s1.drug_id = s.drug_id group by s1.drug_id ) < min_quantity ) or ((select sum(s1.stock_quantity) from tb_stock s1 where s1.drug_id = s.drug_id group by s1.drug_id ) > max_quantity )

select s.id as id,s.warehouse_no as warehouse_no,s.drug_id as drug_id,sum(stock_quantity) as stock_quantity,s.min_quantity as min_quantity,s.max_quantity as max_quantity from tb_stock s where ((select sum(s1.stock_quantity) from tb_stock s1 where s1.drug_id = s.drug_id group by s1.drug_id ) < min_quantity ) or ((select sum(s1.stock_quantity) from tb_stock s1 where s1.drug_id = s.drug_id group by s1.drug_id ) > max_quantity ) group by s.drug_id order by s.id limit #{pageIndex} ,#{pageSize}
select count(s.drug_id) from tb_stock s, tb_purchase_item p where s.drug_id = p.drug_id AND s.batch_no = p.batch_no AND DATEDIFF(p.valid_time,now()) < 15

select s.id as id,s.warehouse_no as warehouse_no,s.batch_no as batch_no,s.drug_id as drug_id from tb_stock s, tb_purchase_item p where s.drug_id = p.drug_id AND s.batch_no = p.batch_no AND DATEDIFF(p.valid_time,now()) < 15 order by s.id limit #{pageIndex} ,#{pageSize}

select DATEDIFF(p.valid_time,now()) from tb_stock s, tb_purchase_item p where s.drug_id = p.drug_id AND s.batch_no = p.batch_no AND DATEDIFF(p.valid_time,now()) < 15 AND s.drug_id = #{drugId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND s.batch_no = #{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select * from tb_stock where drug_id = #{drugId} order by create_time asc
select sum(stock_quantity) from tb_stock s where s.drug_id = #{drugId}
